doc.title: City Vibe
doc.plot: City Vibe explodes L.A.'s music scene wide open. Hit more local shows and follow more local bands with City Vibe's dedicated team of music lovers. Hear tips and horror stories from up-and-coming bands, DJ's, underground and mainstream musicians. City Vibe helps you break into the music industry. Get a load of the real deal from Venue owners, top talent agents, managers, record labels, executives and publicists. Strap on your VIP wristband to L.A.'s monumental music scene.
